data.subject: URGENT: Cannot Access Project
data.description:
I am unable to access my project on Hasura Cloud. When I try to open the project dashboard, it fails to load and shows an error message. This is critically impacting our production environment and needs immediate attention.

Project ID: abc123

We are using PostgreSQL as our database.

Version: v2.41.0

Please assist as soon as possible.

Thank you.

Project ID: 2a8d4b07-c391-450f-8153-f6521f8a20a0

data.subject: Feature Request: Support for Custom GraphQL Directives
data.description:
Hello,

We are using your platform with a PostgreSQL database and would like to request support for custom GraphQL directives in queries and mutations. This feature would greatly help us implement advanced query logic and improve our application's flexibility.

Is this something that could be supported in future releases?

Thank you for your assistance.


Project ID: 2a8d4b07-c391-450f-8153-f6521f8a20a0

data.subject: Urgent: Cannot Access Project
data.description:
Hi Support Team,

We are currently unable to access our project on your platform. When we try to open the project dashboard, we receive a '404 Project Not Found' error. This is impacting our production environment and needs immediate attention. We are using PostgreSQL as our database. Version: v2.47.8.

Please fix this issue as soon as possible.

Thank you.

Project ID: 570737f1-ada3-413b-bec5-e82b6c324fb3

data.subject: GraphQL not functioning as expected in production
data.description:
Hi team,

We're experiencing erratic errors with our GraphQL API in our production environment. Queries that previously worked are now failing intermittently without any consistent pattern. This issue is impacting our users as they're receiving unexpected errors during normal operations.

Our backend is using PostgreSQL as the database. We're currently running Version: v2.46.2.

We haven't made any recent changes to our schema or infrastructure that would explain this behavior. Could you please look into this urgently?

Thank you.

Project ID: 936120f2-5ed2-4bcb-af57-e9b3eeacee81

data.subject: Urgent: Production Environment Down - Immediate Assistance Required
data.description:
Hello,

We are experiencing a complete outage of our production environment. All our services are down, and users are unable to access the application, leading to a major disruption in our operations.

Our application uses PostgreSQL as the database, and we are currently running version v2.48.5. We have not made any recent changes or deployments that could have caused this issue.

We urgently need assistance to resolve this problem.

Thank you,
[Your Name]

Project ID: 76de9616-3d7b-49d7-b909-e154dda91489

data.subject: Performance degradation in Schema Registry operations
data.description:
Over the past few days, we've been experiencing significant performance degradation when performing operations in the Schema Registry. Actions like saving schema changes or retrieving schema diffs are taking much longer than usual, occasionally timing out. This is affecting our deployment schedules.

We are using PostgreSQL as our database, and our Hasura version is v2.45.3.

Could you please look into this issue?

Project ID: 3039d26f-0ab2-4501-8e64-07b16526115a

data.subject: Schema Registry causing high resource usage and slow responses in production
data.description:
Hi,

We are experiencing resource exhaustion issues while using the Schema Registry feature in our production environment. The Schema Registry seems to consume a lot of CPU and memory resources, leading to slow responses from our application.

We are using PostgreSQL as our database.

Version: v2.46.0

Could you please help us resolve this issue?

Thanks.

Project ID: 386d8856-9020-47eb-a21a-2ebe6b81428e

data.subject: URGENT: Service is down - critical issue
data.description:
Hi,

Our API service is completely down and unresponsive. All our production endpoints are failing, and this is causing severe disruption to our business operations. We haven't made any recent changes on our end.

When trying to access the API, we're getting 5xx errors.

Our system uses PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases, and we're running version v2.45.3.

Please investigate and resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Thanks.

Project ID: 386d8856-9020-47eb-a21a-2ebe6b81428e

data.subject: Performance degradation in permission-related operations
data.description:
Hi Support,

We are experiencing significant performance degradation when performing operations that involve permissions in our Hasura setup. Queries that used to execute in milliseconds are now taking several seconds to complete, especially those with complex permission rules.

We are using PostgreSQL as our database. Current Hasura version: v2.44.0.

Could you please help us troubleshoot this issue and suggest any optimizations?

Thanks.

Project ID: d5dc02fc-707a-4084-854a-79f5866d4dd3

data.subject: Cannot access my project - urgent assistance needed
data.description:
Hi support team,

We are experiencing a critical issue where we cannot access our Hasura project. The GraphQL endpoint and the console are both unreachable, and our application is down as a result. This is impacting our production environment.

We are using Postgres as our database backend. Our Hasura version is v2.47.1.

This issue is urgent and requires immediate attention. Please help us resolve this as soon as possible.

Thank you,
[User Name]

Project ID: 5ad39764-9b9b-48cb-8819-43ab40694b06
